name: RedFlagDeals - streamline hot deals forum RFD
description:
Combined with AdBlock for your favorite browser and a nice widescreen monitor, this really makes browsing RFD's hot deals forum easier on the eyes and screen space.  It's a simple style to remove some bloat on the hot deals forum.

Hides the sidebar if you aren't logged in, and the site header.
additional_info:
Version 0.4, Site redesign update. Removes the sidebar when not logged in.

Version 0.3  removed almost all menus, centered hot deals list and page numbers, darker background for contrast

Version 0.22, added domain restrictions so this no longer screws up other sites formatting

Version 0.21, more fixes for format changes

Version 0.2, fixes for recent format changes, still not tested with logging in

Version 0.1, not tested when logged in to the site at all.
